query:
select a.*, round(availability * performance * yield /10000,0) oee from (
select 
  system_id , 
  round(sum(cycle_time/60),0) total_production_time ,
  round(sum(cycle_time/60)/count(serial_num),2) avg_ct,
  round(sum(cycle_time/60)/480*100,0) availability,
  round(17.5/(sum(cycle_time/60) /count(serial_num))*100,0) Performance,
  round(sum(case when PASS_FAIL = 'P' then 1 else 0 end)/count(serial_num) * 100,0) Yield
from lr4_shim_assembly
where
process_date > sysdate-1/3 and
system_id in ('CYBOND38','CYBOND57','CYBOND63','CYBOND60','CYBOND55','CYBOND56','CYBOND14','CYBOND3','CYBOND59','CYBOND58')
group by system_id
)a order by oee asc
